website_summaries.verdict: Packed with features including MP3 compatibility and easy-access 5-disc tray, this model tops the pack for all it has to offer, including the excellent sound it produces.
pros: A 5-disc player/changer with patented PlayXchange technology for seamlessly uninterrupted play
Easy to set up and play
cons: Various malfunctions with the disc changer have been reported, and customer service is a sometimes slow to respond

customer_reviews.title: Decent machine
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I received played music at the wrong speed so I exchanged it for another. My second one has trouble opening. The tray is hesitating and jerking when opening. Also it stopped responding once, but unplugging it temporarily solved that problem. $300. plus is a lot of money to me for stereo equipment. I doubt this one will last long. UPDATE. I’ve had it for over a year now it is still working fine. Perhaps it is a better machine than I originally thought it was.
customer_reviews.author: loafer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this player. Very good sound, quiet and smooth changer mechanism. I suspect CD players, and changers in particular, are going away in the not to distant future. so if you want one, this is it. ALSO, this replaced the Onkyo 6 disc which was junk after a year, don't waste money, get this Yamaha!
customer_reviews.author: Kinglong1

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't last more than two years before it began to stop after 20 minutes of playing. After minimal use and careful care. I was super disappointed. Electronic repair shop told me it's not worth spending the $ to try and fix the optical reader (or whatever the technical term is), as they are not designed to last long. Tried contacting Yamaha support, they sent me to an external service they contract for repair, which said the nearest service center was 1 hour away. No thanks, and after this first experience, I'm not going to buy again. I'll try my luck with a single disc player and see if that can last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gaiseric

customer_reviews.title: Unit is not very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been in service for less than two years and has had very light use in that time. It was in service in a family/entertainment room that is only used when entertaining guests. Two weeks ago it was powered up and all it would do is open the CD drawer and accept CD's then when it was told to play, the drawer would close for a few seconds then re-open. Batteries have been replaced in the remote to no avail. The unit is useless and, Of Course, out of warranty!
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very good cd changer — excellent with an external DAC
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for more than a year with good results, but was unprepared for the quality with an external DAC. My preamp, a McIntosh C52, seems to have a very good DAC, and when the Yamaha is plugged into the preamp via Toslink, and coupled other good components produces a very mellow sound. It runs for hours at a time without the slightest glitch. This is a very good cd changer!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This CD player died after15 months. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggieblue

customer_reviews.title: No technical support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product due to favorable recommendations. Worked nicely for almost a year, although was used lightly. CD changer drawer got stuck and referred to instructions guide but to no avail. Under one-year warranty and tried to contact Yamaha by phone, e-mail and online chat but no response. Very frustrating. Now I have a nonfunctioning CD Changer and no manufacturer support. Not even one year old. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, simple to use.  Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Mom for Christmas. She loves to play CD's, but can be rather challenged with technology. Despite that, she finds it very easy to use. The sound quality is excellent and is very well built. She's been using it daily for almost a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. As an audiophile
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. As an audiophile, music is very important. Don't let anyone tell you that a $3000 cd player is that much better than this. There are very few people in the world who can truly hear a difference between this and the expensive ones. The player has one job- to read the signal and send it to your digital audio converter. This does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Remote seems to be for show only.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday. I think there's too much going on with it. Seems to be a process turning it on. The remote is useless. The writing is minuscule. I prefer to turn a unit on and be done with it instead of having to go through a process to get there. not good , why bother as it has not performed a single function.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Masters Moss

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought it new in January 2018. August 2018 now and it shuts down when you press play. No sound. Not even a year. When it ran, our single disc Blu Ray player (still running) sounds better. Carousels are unreliable by nature but this one died in less than nine months. We work all week so it only ran weekend mornings. We feel dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Uncalledfor

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: I had this thing for 9 months, and then the disc tray would not work - not go in nor come out. Thankfully I took my CD's off the tray so they weren't stuck inside. Too much to ask for one of these damned things to even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Mash

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, but a little slow
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is great, like with previous Yamaha CD carousel player. Response for disk changing and randomizing across disks is quite a bit slower than on an older model (until the carousel quit working after 6+ years), which can be annoying at times, but the choices for carousel players focused on CDs is now very small, so the clear sound makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: JackD

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: After searching FOREVER to replace my old Sony U purchased this one. It is EXCELLENT and way more than aI expected. I did not want to give up listening to my collection of cds and stream music. SUPER SUOER HAPPY WITH THIS ITEM AND HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Twice the price compared to Onkyo with same features but we always had good luck with Yamaha changers. We are Driving two amps at the same time! One with fiber optic cable and one with rca cable simultaneously. Random play works excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Ultra Technologies

customer_reviews.title: The on/off switch does not work anymore, I had problems with this unit before
customer_reviews.text: The on/off switch does not always work now at August 10 it won't work at all I need to send it back to SOMEBODY I NEED A DIFFERENT ONE I AT THIS TIME HAVE HAD 2 OF THESE AND BOTH HAVE BEEN BAD, I DON'T REMEMBER WHAT WAS WRONG WITH THE FIRST ONE, BUT I WOULD LIKE TO RETURN THIS YAMAHA CD PLAYER FOR A FULL REFUND
customer_reviews.author: Henry's Choice. D7GL9W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounding, easy to setup CD changer.
customer_reviews.text: The Yamaha CD 600 CD 5 disk Changer is an easy to use, great sounding CD player. While it is not quite up to true audiophile standard, it comes pretty close to that standard. It delivers enjoyable excellent sounding music content. It is a pleasure to not have to change CD's while shuffling hours of your favorite compact discs. The player functions flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Loan Ranger

customer_reviews.title: and worked great for almost 2 years but in Feb 18 the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a pricey unit ( $300 +) but I thought Yamaha means quality.. Purchased March 15, and worked great for almost 2 years but in Feb 18 the player does not recognize any CD is put in the player. It is now useless. Took into a shop for repair and would cost $225 to fix it. Forget it The C600 replaced a Yamaha CD changer I bought back in 1986 that worked great for almost 30 years. Yamaha used to stand for quality.....it no longer does....BUY SOMETHING ELSE
customer_reviews.author: R. Quandt

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor interface
customer_reviews.text: There aren't many 5-disc changers on the market today, so I didn't have much choice when my beloved NAD-523 gave up the ghost. This one has some nice features and the sound quality is fine. However, I don't much like the user interface. The tray opens above the display and controls, so it's hard to see what's going on. Even worse, there's a long delay from the time you turn it on to the time the controls become responsive. I'm used to turning on a device, opening the tray, popping in CDs, and hitting play. With the Yamaha, there's a notable delay in this procedure. Also, the buttons for basic controls (play/pause, stop, skip) could be larger.
customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing remote for CD player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CD player to replace one I owned. From the information and photo, I thought they were nearly identical. However, the new remote control, unlike the old one, does not control the volume. Thus I must now use two remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Art Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement, nice sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I find this a good replacement for my top of the line Sony that died after nearly 20 years. It is a little noisy when discs are changed but with this player behind glass doors it is not all that bad. I like the exchange a CD while playing feature. The sound quality is great and I have it playing through our surround sound system in the family room (stereo mode). The remote is a bit odd in layout but that could be because most of my home and personal electronics are Sony or Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick W. Jaxheimer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent CD player
customer_reviews.text: After my 25 year old 6 disc cd player finally gave out I had to go on the painful hunt of looking for a new one. Finally I found this one, the sound is good and functions well. The remote took some getting used to, it’s very sensitive so you can’t stick it in your pocket without accidentally putting it into automatic fast forward or changing songs or even discs. After a year of owning this no issues have arisen.
customer_reviews.author: Madam Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Has Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: We had a Sony player for MANY years and it stopped working. Since Sony doesn't seem to make the item any more, we purchased the Yamaha model and are satisfied with it except for the fact it is a slightly different size than the previous player and we will have to modify the cabinet in the back to be able to shut the front door of the entertainment cabinet. We have not used the remote yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a part of a DYI home theater/music system. When played thru a Denon receiver and Klipsch speakers, it sounds really good. The changer is a little slow and noisy, but not sure anything is better. The remote is not the best, and the battery cover broke the first time I tried to close it. I'll be getting a programmable remote, so no big deal. The sound is the best thing about this, and I hope the changer reliability is better than the Sony I had a few years ago. Edit--this things sounds really good with Audio Technica ATH-M40fs headphones. There is no headphone out on the player, but the Denon receiver and this are a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Brian_F

customer_reviews.title: Quality Machine!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this CD changer. I appreciate the sleep mode and that it will play my ipods. Plus, it is very easy to access all the cd's for removal. Sounds great, great quality, changes cd's rapidly, and it's not clunky sounding. Highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Receiver never worked right out of the box :(
customer_reviews.text: Awful receiver. Never worked right out of the box. Not sure what the problem was, but everything sounded terrible. Not the speakers as hooked those up to another receiver and they worked fine. Have owned Yamaha products before and been very satisfied. For the higher cost and brand name, expected a much better product and experience. Had to return this product, but should note that the Amazon return process was great though :)
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: and it's very nice. It's not the newest state of the art ...
customer_reviews.text: Working very well. Hooked up to house system to play old cds, and it's very nice. It's not the newest state of the art technology, but it is made well, we are also able to hook a current iPhone up to it and steam music from Amazon Prime music, or off any apple music lists. So, it['s doing everything we'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jordan

customer_reviews.title: garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July 2018 and February 2019 it is dead! As usual another piece of electronic junk! Better off going to Best Buy or even Walmart for any electronics.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Sounds great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived very quickly. It feels well made and sounds terrific. My Sony died a year ago and I have gone without. I know the idea of CD's is getting out dated, but I really missed having a CD changer. I thought I could get by with streaming from my computer. Of course then you need to make play lists etc. It is so easy to drop 5 CD's in and listen to what you want. I have no tried the USB input yet, but if it works as advertised I think that will be nice for my I-pod where I have already made playlists.
customer_reviews.author: CSW

customer_reviews.title: Yamah CD
customer_reviews.text: Great CD Player! I felt it was a little bit expensive, but was hard trying to find a NEW CD Player; Easy to connect and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: actually annoying with it wee control buttons and minimal readout information/presentation
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaces a defunct earlier model that offered substantial reproduction, sorry for its demise. The CD-C00BL model provides marvelous reproduction however the unit's "front" is much less friendly, actually annoying with it wee control buttons and minimal readout information/presentation. Don't even get me going about the remote. It's as if small same size buttons and lack of design/presentation was not even a consideration. Compared to the earlier, 2003 model of DVD/CD five disc player, happily it is the equal in sound, to me. Sadly, Yamaha seems to have foregone the rest of what purchasing a reasonably decent quality sound reproducing apparatus and it's obligation to the consumer of providing quality in all aspects for the price it is asking.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Laurent

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Not even a year and a half old and it quit, saying that it couldn’t sense a disc in the changer. I removed and replaced discs, turned it on and off, same result. My old Yamaha was terrific but this new one certainly hasn’t done well. No more Yamaha for me.
customer_reviews.author: Isobel Osius

customer_reviews.title: No random play
customer_reviews.text: Player worked OK, a little clunky. Sound was good. Biggest drawback was no random play feature for either a single disc or all disc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkable CD player, replacing my old Sony, and these will be impossible to find before long.. It connects to my new Sony receiver as well as the older one, same plug types, I highly recommend this player, Sounds great also..
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great CD multiple disc player.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was in great condition. Box had some damage but unit is perfect and working just fine. Happy to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bracey

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for my Sony
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece of equipment. Glad I could still find a decent CD changer. The sound is a little different from my old Sony, which was (by luck) an especially nice match with my other components. I may not have the system dialed in just right for the Yamaha yet, but I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent changer
customer_reviews.text: Replaces a ten-year-old Denon CD changer. An enormous improvement. Noticeable difference in sound reproduction, though some of that may be due to the fact that I bought a new Yamaha receiver at the same time. Works flawlessly. Only minor criticism would be the abruptness of the open and close mechanism. It's a curiosity to me how the c.d.'s stay in their positions because of the latter, but they do.
customer_reviews.author: Jay N Miller

customer_reviews.title: ok at first
customer_reviews.text: stopped working in 2019 so had to buy another cd player from another store
customer_reviews.author: John Crets

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but awful user interface
customer_reviews.text: While the fidelity and quality of the product is excellent, the user interface of the CD player's face-plate and remote control are AWFUL. The buttons are too small and the pictographs are illegible. Have to use this player's functionality by memorization. I bought this player via Amazon, where the poor user interfaces were not really discernable. If I had seen it in a store, I would have looked right past it. The price/value/fidelity equation is strong, but the UI is almost reason to pass.
customer_reviews.author: Esau

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and is compatible with my surround sound system in CD/Digital mode.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Bonomo

customer_reviews.title: OK until it started doing weird things!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned the item and decided to go with a single disc player. It started doing weird things after about two weeks of use. The optical output would intermittently quit working and then suddenly start up again by itself for no apparent reason. When in program mode it would, for no apparent reason, start in the middle of a track and not advance the track number. The lack of a headphone jack was also an aggravating factor. For the first two weeks it worked it was fine. I have come to the conclusion that I'm better off spending a comparable amount of money on a single disc player and see if the quality might be better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Traum

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD player, very convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: Have used about 4 months, like it, no conplaints. The pure direct button makes a difference, when not engaged the sound was too bright, and more natural when engaged.
customer_reviews.author: Geigen

customer_reviews.title: One of my worst purchases
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in Feb 2017 and it stopped working in June 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Allenby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Player. Best feature is the USB port!
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Good sound from CDs. The USB is the best feature and a no brainer as CDs are dated and people now use players, laptops, and phones for music Amazing other companies haven't caught on to this. Loss business for them. USB port works fine with my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work well with CD's I have burned myself.
customer_reviews.text: Our last CD player/changer skipped when we tried to play CDs we had burned ourselves. I want to emphasize that we have not had this player very long, but so far, it seems to play our home burned CDs without skipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alene L Svenson

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten the unit to work, CD drawer won'r stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy in NC

customer_reviews.title: An excellent CD changer.
customer_reviews.text: The remote has a lot of features but is hard to read because the typeset is very small and there are a lot of control buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Olver

customer_reviews.title: You need an amplifier.
customer_reviews.text: Since you need an amplifier to get sound it is good, but is it live or is it Memorex. The CD player is well built and not too heavy. It is easy too use.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy lady

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, Great retailer!
customer_reviews.text: This CD player replaces and older player that was malfunctioning. The Yamaha unit reads mp3 and wha files and also can work with an iPod which allows for a wide range of music for me. Unit was advertised as “like new, customer return” and upon receipt it may as well have been new. Everything was untouched. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Louis N.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and EAsy!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, plug it in and voila - music! Wonderful. I can not answer durability, ask me in 5 or 6 years. It fit in my shelf with the receiver, the Ipod, the Sirius and all the remotes!
customer_reviews.author: online buyer

customer_reviews.title: New 5 Disc CD Player
customer_reviews.text: The player arrived intact and as described. It will replace our old CD player which stopped working. The player easily fit into our modular stereo system. It is working well. We would do business with this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: tracqman

customer_reviews.title: DAC rules
customer_reviews.text: I got this expecting to be hi-fi but it surprised me how well it does the job, for day to day FO works fine, it plays like high-end player... go to pure direct mode (RCA plugs) and it will surprise you too. Recommendation: get some good RCA cables
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: don't watse money on anything else
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. In replacing an old Yamaha Natural Sound 5CD, I wasted money on a single CD Cambridge Audio (excellent) and a 5 disk Sony (junk), before coming back to the Yamaha that does everything I need and with sound quality difficult to distinguish from the Cambridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced old Yamaha 5 disc
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to replace my old 5 disc Yamaha. The Sound is great and it is a Yamaha. So far so good. My old disc player just got worn out over time. I did use my old 5 disc quite often. I am very happy with the sound and ease of use of this new 5 disc player. Very happy with Yamaha, always have been always will be. Amazon had the best price and fast delivery. Did I mention it sounds great?
customer_reviews.author: Addeo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best decision I ever made to buy this it work Wonderful two thumbs up for me
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a multiple disc player because I am too lazy to put a new CD in every hour or so. I like to listen to instrumentals on CDs. Classical, pop, Manheim Steamroller, you name it as long as it is a big orchestra. Was concerned that I might be sacrificing quality for convenience but not so. I am very pleased and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Tew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and features - complex remote.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this CD changer 4 stars for ease of use only because there seem to be a ton of advanced features that are just techno-Greek to me, and they make the remote control overly complicated. Using the basic 5-disc changer is easy, however, and the USB plug-in is outstanding: the sound quality of MP3s on a thumb drive was excellent. I was looking for a 5-disc changer that would play MP3 and WMA discs, and although this unit costs more than others with those features, it had much better reviews from users. I've had it for a little over a month and am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan A the CPA

customer_reviews.title: Startling Improvement in sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, so I don't know how long it will last, but the sound quality is surprisingly better than the Sony player that it replaced. So far, everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Harry D

customer_reviews.title: Performs s described
customer_reviews.text: High Quality product and it matches my Yamaha multi-function Receiver. Yamaha hasn't disappointed me yet. You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: R. Poltz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CD changer, no need for vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Complements my new Yamaha receiver. I am listening to it as I write this--a CD of Alan Hovhaness. Sound reproduction is excellent and mechanics of the unit are fine as well. Except for Super-audio CD the reproduction quality of "redbook" CD cannot be beaten. I listened to vinyl on a good stereo from the 1960s until CDs came out in the early 1980s and have never looked back. Vinylists mistake RIAA equalization for warmth of sound and put up with a noise floor some 30 db above that of CD, as well as "snap, crackle, pop." Tell me why when excellent CD players and CDs are inexpensively available.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Giuffrida Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Music
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, fast delivery. Able to enjoy music more now.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cabluck

customer_reviews.title: The sound is awesome, the CD changer is near silent and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this CD player with my new R-N303BL Yamaha amp and it works really well. The sound is awesome, the CD changer is near silent and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD player for multiple discs
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a CD player that handles multiple discs. This one does, and setting it up / connecting it to the amplifier took me all of 4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Have two
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these CD changers. I decided to put a unit in another area of the house and bought this one. The original one I purchased is still working fine. This unit includes a USB port so I can also use it with my IPod and other computer equipment. Both have been an excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: R. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Decided on Yamaha because of other great reviews on CD Changers that are now no longer in production. This unit also had a great review, so ordered before Christmas. Delivery was quite fast, a plus. CD Changer was easy to hook up and start playing. Received in time to start enjoying Christmas music CDs we had without having to change out CD after CD as we did with DVD player that we used for listening to CDs one at a time, which was so bothersome. First 5-CD Changer for us and really do enjoy it. Sound is good quality. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Conrad

customer_reviews.title: 5 Disc. CD Player - Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Sound quality was very good. I have played CD and all function worked well. Have not used the USB port yet, but plan on using in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lee Lemoins

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary Sound and Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I just can't say enough about this changer/player. I just added it to my Yamaha Home Theater - Receiver and surround sound speakers... I am amazed at the clarity, the depth and the rich sound. I am VERY happy and would highly recommend this unit. 5 CD at a time... plus the amazing ability to play Ipod via front USB port. I may never leave my home again. Addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Guiot

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective from day one.
customer_reviews.text: I have been satisfied with Yamaha CD players in the past, but this one was defective out-of-the-box. CD drawer would open on its own, it didn't recognized ANY discs that I tried (all discs were pristine), other issues too. Maybe I got a lemon, but use caution on this model. I returned mine via Amazon's wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Buy a CD player that is simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated for an individual with no knowledge on electronics...
customer_reviews.author: plrRuben D Garza

customer_reviews.title: I like Yamaha equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived poorly packed. CD tray would not open. Something was rattling around inside player. Returned for a-replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old unit with this newer version and it works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Changer
customer_reviews.text: It is even better than I expected. It replaced a Magnavox 5 CD Changer that was not working any more. The Yamaha works great and the sound is much much better than the sound of the Magnavox I was happy with. CDs come to life.
customer_reviews.author: diybill

customer_reviews.title: Playing my CDs Again
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. I am hearing details in the music that I never heard before. the other thing I like is I can turn it off, not just to stand-by mode.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Exc sound, good range and detail. Superior to older Sony it replaced. Arrived quickly, well packed, although side of outer box punched in, without damage to inner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean sound
customer_reviews.text: Totally enjoy the sound quality which I expect from Yamaha but as usual they could make a better remote...it’s a great upgrade from my denon unit
customer_reviews.author: Brad S

customer_reviews.title: Works well, sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: This changer replaces an old JVC that was getting stuck and not opening or rotating correctly. Although I have only used it for a week, I am pleased with the ease of use, sound quality and look. The remote is easy to use and the manual is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and amplifier connection. Easy-to-load and unload cd pockets. Quiet mechanical operation and the uncluttered face looks great on my component shelf. The sound quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Sorem

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha 5 Disc CD Changer
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this CD player a lot. It replaced one by Denon. It has many features. One is that you can connect your IPod to play. The description needs to explain, 'not all IPods will work with this player;' otherwise, it's spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Wattsan

customer_reviews.title: CD player
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the Yamaha 5 disc CD player. Great sound quality and works well. Our old one had crashed and we were really missing it . We were surprised and elated that we got the new player so quickly. Great Job!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy, happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write evaluations. This Yamaha product was as I expected. Easy to use, excellent quality at a reasonable price. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good
customer_reviews.text: So far I have played about 100 of my recorded discs and have had no problems with it. The sound is good also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bed.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Good quality but little not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: FUMC

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: It was a refurbished item. It is working perfectly. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rprt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a warn out cd changer. This changer adapted perfectly to my system and sounds and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ament

customer_reviews.title: yamaha cd-c6000bl 5 disc cd changer
customer_reviews.text: great sound w/cd's. slight drop off in sound quality with ipod or usb connected. didn't try analog connection yet because optical connection is very good, and much easier to use. note: only had this for less than 1 month. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: laejr

customer_reviews.title: YAMAHA CD-C600BL
customer_reviews.text: The description and information given in Amazon by Yamaha is complete and accurate. The sound you obtain playing a CD or connecting the I'Pod is very good,superior to any other CD player I heard before.You can identify the different instruments and the voice of the singers is perfect. Is very easy to use and all the features announced work properly. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HERNANDO LOZANO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Changer works well, smooth and quiet. Sound quality excellent, better than Sony 10 CD changer I replaced. Could use random play button on front console instead of only on remote.
customer_reviews.author: TSS

customer_reviews.title: ... sound quality and functionality of this unit is very good. The versatility of being able to play my ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and functionality of this unit is very good. The versatility of being able to play my iPod through the USB port and the multi-disc changer is what appealed to me. Great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Lane

customer_reviews.title: Shuffle is on remote!
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier version of this changer I had bought several years ago. My mp3 player does not work with this one and the shuffle (which I use exclusively) is on the remote. I couldn't believe it! Otherwise I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Just want a good product

customer_reviews.title: Great CD Changer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that a CHANGER could make a difference in sound, but I swear all our CDs sound better than before , even though the sound is coming through the same speakers. This changer is very easy to use (good manual, too), and it plays MP3 CDs, not just audio CDs. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: rickathens

customer_reviews.title: A good CD Player
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good sounding CD player regardless its price. Good circuitry and solid materials are used to build this high quality player.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Sound is far better than my last CD ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sound is far better than my last CD player which was also a Yamaha. My last Yamaha was disappointing, it took a dive after two years when the CD player decided to only play every other CD I loaded. With the new CD player the CD's all play so far. Time will tell. John
customer_reviews.author: John T. Cook

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality player . the case is well built, not some cheap plastic housing. Sounds great and nice features. Easy to use, 5 stars in my book. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Better than the last one
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Yamaha CD changer, just like this one. Had it for years; used it until it completely wore down. This new one is even better; the carrousel moves quickly, and the CD changes very quietly.
customer_reviews.author: KindleKen

customer_reviews.title: The CD player has exceeded my expectations. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The CD player has exceeded my expectations. I had a similar model for 20 years before it breaking. Yamaha products have lasted longer than expected with a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Ann Myre

customer_reviews.title: after a terrible experience with a Sony product
customer_reviews.text: Had to go with the Yamaha, after a terrible experience with a Sony product. I should have known better. My whole system is built with Yamaha. I tried to save some money by going Sony, and what a disappointment. The Sony never made it thru the first disc, before it crapped out. The Yamaha CD- 600BL was a god send. It does everything it advertises, and is so easy to set up and operate. It plays every thing without a hitch. The quality and the sound are unmatched. Listen up, spend a little extra and go Yamaha. You'll never be disappointed. I've gone Yamaha for 30+ years, and Yamaha is definite family member.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It has incredible sound! I like that you can change all 5 at the same time or change 4 while listening to 1.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha CD Player Review
customer_reviews.text: The Yamaha CD-C600 five disc player is a top notch compact disc player and works well with the rest of my stereo equipment. This replaces an 18 disc player unit which finally died. Five hours of Christmas music is fine! Good Unit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha CD-C600BL 5 disc CD changer
customer_reviews.text: So far we really like this disc changer/player and don't have any complaints - I think if you get one you will be happy. Amazon was very fast with shipping and item was packaged well. We had to get a new disc player as our older (outdated) one was great, but incompatible with our new home theater system.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: the player is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given five stars if the CD tray would have rotated when inserting and removing the CDs. Other then the issue with the tray, the player is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

product_meta.title: Yamaha Cd-c600bl 5-Disc Cd Changer Black, 2.6 Lb
product_meta.description: Enjoy hours of high fidelity audio with the Yamaha CD-C600 Five-Disc CD Changer. This 5-disc CD changer can play your collection of CD and CD-R/RW discs as well as MP3 and WMA files from a disc or USB memory. Meanwhile, CD text display allows you to see the CD title, artists name and track title so you can follow along with your music. With PlayXchange, you can open the disc tray while playing to load additional discs without interrupting your music. A high performance DAC allows for high conversion precision with low noise to ensure high quality reproduction for even the most discerning audiophiles. Additional convenient features include Pure Direct mode, a digital optical out connection and iPod compatibility. The "Made for iPod" logo means your new CD-C600 can connect to and charge your iPod, allowing you to listen to your music and operate your iPod via the remote control. This CD player also offers custom installation features including an RS-232C port and IR in/out terminals. The CD-C600 seamlessly incorporates high quality audio reproduction, advanced features and several additional conveniences into one sleek package. Numerous convenient playback functions with Full opening disc tray for changing 5 discs at a time. Dynamic Range: 96 dB.
feature_bullets: Yamaha's patented PlayXchange for enjoying uninterrupted music
Full opening disc tray for changing 5 discs at a time; Output: Optical
USB port on front panel for iPod and other devices. Frequency Response : 10 Hz-20 kHz plus/ minus 0.5 dB
CD R / RW disc playback compatibility. High performance DAC for high conversion precision with low noise

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars438 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
